ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:03:43 [Issue ID 4000-118279] urn:comicvine:4000-118279 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:47:49. [Issue ID 393870]
ComicInfo.Summary: Frank “Madman” Einstein is LOST IN SPACE and SPACED AND LOST, but friends are on the way! This nail-biting cosmic adventure has old and new members of THE ATOMICS to the rescue! You’re not gonna miss the galactic events of this issue along with the usual grab bag of choiceness in the Madman universe!
ComicInfo.Title: We Are Atomic!
